name: WizBang
description:
Adorable, Magical, Mayhem!

Challenge your friends in Wiffleflux's most celebrated magical-fighting tournament : WizBang —  a mayhem-fueled frenzy of spell-slinging, arm-swinging, body-flipping and drop-kicking that magic-folk from all over compete in for their chance to earn the title of WizBang champion!

WizBang is a 2D  twin-stick platform-brawler for up to 8 players (local multiplayer).

  • Stage intense battles on 3 beautiful, dynamic and interactive levels that will test your skill and keep the fight fresh
  • Get twitchy with 360-degrees of unhinged play that allows you to shoot spells, aim dashes and launch dropkicks in any direction
  • Choose from 7 intensely-unique and kooky characters, each with their own subtle variance in play-style
  • Pick-up and play with with a simple control-scheme that enables players of all skill-levels to join-in and have fun, whilst giving skillful players a very roomy skill-ceiling to explore.
